content.raw:
I got some compilation errors:

    -- ==> add_subdirectory(subt/subt-communication/subt_rf_interface)
    -- +++ processing catkin package: 'subt_communication_model'
    -- ==> add_subdirectory(subt/subt-communication/subt_communication_model)
    CMake Error at /opt/ros/melodic/share/catkin/cmake/test/gtest.cmake:169 (add_executable):
      add_executable cannot create target "unit_test" because another target with
      the same name already exists.  The existing target is an executable created
      in source directory
      "/home/developer/subt_ws/src/subt/subt-communication/subt_rf_interface".
      See documentation for policy CMP0002 for more details.
    Call Stack (most recent call first):
      /opt/ros/melodic/share/catkin/cmake/test/gtest.cmake:79 (_catkin_add_executable_with_google_test)
      /opt/ros/melodic/share/catkin/cmake/test/gtest.cmake:28 (_catkin_add_google_test)
      subt/subt-communication/subt_communication_model/CMakeLists.txt:48 (catkin_add_gtest)
    
    
    CMake Error at subt/subt-communication/subt_communication_model/CMakeLists.txt:49 (target_link_libraries):
      Attempt to add link library "subt_communication_model" to target
      "unit_test" which is not built in this directory.
    
    
    CMake Error at subt/subt-communication/subt_communication_model/CMakeLists.txt:49 (target_link_libraries):
      Attempt to add link library "subt_rf_range_model" to target "unit_test"
      which is not built in this directory.
    
    
    CMake Error at subt/subt-communication/subt_communication_model/CMakeLists.txt:49 (target_link_libraries):
      Attempt to add link library "/opt/ros/melodic/lib/libroscpp.so" to target
      "unit_test" which is not built in this directory.
    
    
    CMake Error at subt/subt-communication/subt_communication_model/CMakeLists.txt:49 (target_link_libraries):
      Attempt to add link library
      "/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libboost_filesystem.so" to target "unit_test"
      which is not built in this directory.
      
      [...]

Could you reproduce it on your side?
content.html:
I got some compilation errors:

-- ==> add_subdirectory(subt/subt-communication/subt_rf_interface)
-- +++ processing catkin package: 'subt_communication_model'
-- ==> add_subdirectory(subt/subt-communication/subt_communication_model)
CMake Error at /opt/ros/melodic/share/catkin/cmake/test/gtest.cmake:169 (add_executable):
  add_executable cannot create target "unit_test" because another target with
  the same name already exists.  The existing target is an executable created
  in source directory
  "/home/developer/subt_ws/src/subt/subt-communication/subt_rf_interface".
  See documentation for policy CMP0002 for more details.
Call Stack (most recent call first):
  /opt/ros/melodic/share/catkin/cmake/test/gtest.cmake:79 (_catkin_add_executable_with_google_test)

CMake Error at subt/subt-communication/subt_communication_model/CMakeLists.txt:49 (target_link_libraries):
  Attempt to add link library "subt_communication_model" to target
  "unit_test" which is not built in this directory.
